Class WeightedEdgeIn

java.lang.Object
io.github.leobeaumont.Edge
io.github.leobeaumont.EdgeIn
io.github.leobeaumont.WeightedEdgeIn
public class WeightedEdgeIn extends EdgeIn
Represents an incoming edge with a specified weight.

WeightedEdgeIn extends EdgeIn and can only be activated if its origin Place contains at least as many tokens as its weight. Activation removes a number of tokens equal to the weight from the origin place.

      public WeightedEdgeIn(Place origin, Transition arrival, int weight) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new WeightedEdgeIn connecting a Place to a Transition with the specified weight.
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin Place of the edge
      arrival - the arrival Transition of the edge
      weight - the weight of the edge (must be non-negative)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if weight is negative

    • isActivable

      public boolean isActivable()
      Determines whether this edge can be activated.

      A WeightedEdgeIn is activable if its origin Place contains at least as many tokens as its weight.

      Specified by:
      isActivable in class EdgeIn
      Returns:
      true if the edge can be activated; false otherwise

    • activate

      public void activate()
      Activates this edge.

      For WeightedEdgeIn, this removes a number of tokens equal to the weight from the origin Place.

      Specified by:
      activate in class Edge
